thag2.47:1.1: The conceited mind, addicted to pleasure,
thag2.47:1.2: impales itself on its own stake.
thag2.47:1.4: there’s a stake, a chopping block.
thag2.47:2.1: I declare you the demon mind!
thag2.47:2.2: I declare you the insidious mind!
thag2.47:2.3: You’ve found the teacher so hard to find—
thag2.47:2.4: don’t lead me away from the goal.
